## Maybe type

Maybe

Signature:

```typescript
export declare type Maybe<A extends any[], T> = T | Factory<A, T>;
```

References: [Factory](/api/bud-framework/factory)

## Remarks

If T is a function, and it is passed a value of type A, it returns T. If it is not a function, it returns T.
